item.title: Welcome... to... well, me!
item.description: A dodgy upgrade of Ghost has lost my website, and as such, I thought it was time to start again. Stay tuned for more from me!
item.content:
A dodgy upgrade of Ghost has lost my website, and as such, I thought it was time to start again.

Stay tuned for more from me!

item.title: About
item.description: My name is Matthew Gall, and when I’m not dealing with all things abuse as a Senior Trust & Safety Engineer at Cloudflare, I’m probably moonlighting as one of the founders of PiCymru, or working on films, or flying drones. I reside in London, but my home is Wales. Er fy mod wrth fy modd yn siarad Cymraeg, nid wyf yn siarad cymaint ag y dylwn. You see it’s quite simple… Starting off young, I’ve been a software engineer since 2000, over 17 years and I’ve seen it all.
item.content:
My name is Matthew Gall, and when I’m not dealing with all things abuse as a Senior Trust & Safety Engineer at Cloudflare, I’m probably moonlighting as one of the founders of PiCymru, or working on films, or flying drones.

I reside in London, but my home is Wales. Er fy mod wrth fy modd yn siarad Cymraeg, nid wyf yn siarad cymaint ag y dylwn.

You see it’s quite simple…

Starting off young, I’ve been a software engineer since 2000, over 17 years and I’ve seen it all.

item.title: Tools
item.description: Sometimes, I need data in other formats, and sometimes, that is just hard. Well, not any longer with these following systems! Websites abuse.cloud Seeing abusive behaviour from an IP address, or on an IP address. Need to know whom to contact? Now you can with abuse.cloud Visit » asnjson.com asnjson.com is a simple frontend to the amazing Team Cymru, IP to ASN lookup tool Visit » Source » count.re Sometimes we just need a counter, nothing magic, just a simple counter.
item.content:
Sometimes, I need data in other formats, and sometimes, that is just hard. Well, not any longer with these following systems!

Websites

abuse.cloud

Seeing abusive behaviour from an IP address, or on an IP address. Need to know whom to contact? Now you can with abuse.cloud

Visit »

asnjson.com

asnjson.com is a simple frontend to the amazing Team Cymru, IP to ASN lookup tool

Visit »
Source »

count.re

Sometimes we just need a counter, nothing magic, just a simple counter. If you need this, then count.re is for you!

Visit »
Source »

dnsjson.com

For when DNS is a pain, and parsing DNS is even worse. Pick any supported record type, and get back JSON or plain text responses direct to your app.

Visit »
Source »

ipinfo.in

Ever wanted to run your own IP lookup service like canhazip.com? Don’t want to resort to awful PHP? Powered by Python and bottle, now you can!

Visit »
Source »

whereismy.family

Visit »
Source »

Chatbots

1.1.1.1 - Cloudflare DNS

oneoneoneonebot
onezerozeroonebot
onedotonedotonedotonedotbot
cloudflarednsbot

urlscan.io

urlscanbot
